author: kylek
title: Open Source Social Account Verifier
description: It shouldn't be so hard to verify someone's control of a social account, email, etc; exchange info; and limit platform silos and censorship.
solution: To take the first step toward decentralized profiles; let's create the first open source, proof-of-control issuers using Atala.
experience: We are a group of Atala Prism Pioneers, software engineers (20+ years of experience), stake pool operators, and computer science students.
